# Draft:Punpreedee Khumprom Rodsaward

Punpreedee Khumprom Rodsaward  (Thai: ปุญญ์ปรีดี คุ้มพร้อม รอดสวาสดิ์, born 14 January 1999); popularly known by the nickname PP (Thai: พีพี) is a Thai actress. She is currently signed under Channel 3. She is best known for her roles in Love Destiny 2 (2023) and Duangjai Dhevaprom (2024).
= Early life and Education =
Punpreedee Khumprom Rodsaward was born on January 14, 1999. Her family is from Surat Thani Province in southern Thailand. She is the youngest of three siblings, with one older brother, Preedewat Khumprom Rodsaward, and one older sister, Punpalee Khumprom Rodsaward. Her family runs a real estate business.
She completed her lower secondary education at Yothinburana School and later graduated from St. Francis Xavier School for her upper secondary education. She earned a bachelor’s degree in Sociology from the Faculty of Political Science, Chulalongkorn University.
During her university years, she represented her faculty as a contestant in the Faculty of Political Science Star Contest as a member of the faculty's cheerleading team.
= Acting Career =
Punpreedee began her career by appearing in commercials. In 2021, she signed a contract with Channel 3. She debuted as a TV host on the variety show SeeSan Banterng. She then made her acting debut in the 2022 BL drama "The Miracle of Teddy Bear", playing the role of “Pribpre”. The same year, she starred in two more dramas: Poisonous Passion as “Prim”, and Bad Romeo as “Yam Som”.
In 2023, she appeared in the drama Interlocking Hearts on Chao Phraya as “Soydao,” followed by You’re My Universe as “Kaew”, and Love Destiny 2 as “Mae Prang.”
In 2024, she starred in the big project of Channel 3, together with Noppakao Dechaphatthanakun, in the Duangjai Dhevaprom series, which consists of 5 consecutive series, Laorchan, Kwanruetai, Jaiphisut, Dujapsorn and Porncheewan.
As a leading actor in Porncheewan, her name became well known, since the series gained popularity nationwide. Porncheewan achieved a record-breaking performance, and set the new highest audience ratings on Channel 3, both in Bangkok and Nationwide. All episodes of Porncheewan were number one trending on X in Thailand. The Episode 8 and 11 were number one trending on X worldwide. The final episode was number two trending on X worldwide. The series was well-received by Thai audiences and her character gained wide popularity.
She also has an upcoming drama, Saen Rak, as Ranee, starring opposite Kongthap Peak.
